titles: The world's infection. Or A relation of the monstrous and abominable sin of women being Adamiani partly: that is, with their naked breasts and outstretched necks, like the wanton dames of Zion.
notes: Imperfect; pages stained with heavy print show-through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Women --  History --  To 500 --  Early works to 1800.
Nudity --  Religious aspects --  Early works to 1800.
